revised_title: Robert Boyle and His Foreign Visitors
tldr: This article explores the life and work of Robert Boyle, a prominent figure in the scientific community, and his interactions with foreign visitors. It highlights the high regard and esteem in which he was held by scholars from various countries, and discusses the impact of these relationships on Boyle's work and the development of the Royal Society.
